subtitle: Jumping around like hell on wheels! Keep it cool... but not too much !
Don’t get too attached to this poor soul, if you do well, none will be left.
By god’s nails! Don’t let those prayers beat us!
I know you’re a beginner, but I still think that it’s too easy
They had a family you know, the last one had a baby girl named Beatrice, nice
Why so serious? Those priests deserved it, yes... but live a little, kill a lot!
*humming* That’s a nice stroll, don’t forget to take some time to yourself
I wonder... should I trim my horns? What do you think?
What a cute village, for now at least *evil laugh*
Soon none will stand in our way, to Hell they come
Don’t be such a blue devil, you still have a lot to curse
Congratulation, you certainly spared no efforts for this
Winning while sleeping, in a way i'm impressed
You'll do better next time, after all, a damned soul has all the time in the world
You won fair and square, or shoud I say pentagram *laughing*
No one was spaired, it'll be crowded down there *laughing*. Even Beatrice's Dad is here!
Yes you reached the goal, but i'm still craving some souls...
You’re doing good ! But maybe a bit too good now that I think of it
Well you are still alive, that’s something, but maybe it’ll be easier to go on a rampage after killing the exorcists
You certainly know who your enemies are… keep it up champ
Ahah! I like the spirit of a free kill… but does it help you?
Welcome to the Village, a proper place to prove your worth dear curse. The church is on high alert, so give them Hell!
Welcome to your first assignement as a curse, the Village. Not the easiest time, the church is on high alert, so give them Hell!
You don't have enough mana yet.
They did not see that coming ! You are learning fast dear curse.
Do you feel this tingle in your nose? I think its your hair growing.
